cause.description:
Stella Steve is a misguided man he is the last one of a great race. We need to raise £1,000,000 to build a habitat for his kind, which will consist of a night club for him and his friends to roam around in and drink as much Stella as possible without being concerned about what people around him think. he can dance so badly without the fear of being chucked out or injuring passers by. also in this habitat there will be a football pitch and seven houses just in case he has friends to stay. please help as much as you can we need your help
1. Save Stella Steve
2. He needs to be looked after
3. especially on nights out
cause.name: S.S.S (Save Stella Steve)
